name: Espresso
description: A concentrated shot of very strong coffee made by forcing hot water through finely grounded coffee beans

name: Americano
description: A shot of espresso diluted with hot water

name: Cappuccino
description: A shot of espresso with equal amount of steamed milk and foam

name: Latte
description: A shot of espresso with steamed milk and small layer of foam

name: Macchiato
description: A shot of espresso with a dollop of foamed milk on top

name: Iced latte
description: A shot of espresso with steamed milk, ica and small layer of foam

name: Classic croissant
description: Airy pastry baked with love

name: Pistachio croissant
description: Airy pastry filled with pistachio cream

name: Chocolate croissant
description: Airy pastry filled with smooth chocolate paste

name: Cinnamon roll
description: Fluffy doughy pastry with cinnamon sugar inside and creamy glaze on top

name: Chocolate Cinnamon roll
description: Fluffy dough with cinnamon sugar inside and chocolaty glaze on top

name: Slice of apple pie
description: Flaky crust filled with fresh apple filling

name: Chocolate cheesecake
description: Creamy cheesecake with chocolate on top of flaky sweet crust

name: Strawberry cheesecake
description: Creamy cheesecake with fresh slices of strawberries on top of flaky sweet crust

name: San-sebastian
description: Creamy flavor-full slice of heaven

name: Mini pizza
description: Perfectly portioned light meal

name: Samsa with meat
description: Meat filled traditional pastry

name: Samsa with potatoes
description: Potato filled traditional pastry

name: Samsa with Chicken
description: Tender chicken filled traditional pastry

name: Sausage puff
description: Airy dough with delicious sausage inside

name: Meat pie
